statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.description: — Jamarii Thomas scored 20 points to help Norfolk State hold off Morgan State 85-82 on Monday night.
article.headline: Thomas scores 20 as Norfolk State defeats Morgan State 85-82
article.linkText: Thomas scores 20 as Norfolk State defeats Morgan State 85-82
article.story: BALTIMORE -- — Jamarii Thomas scored 20 points to help Norfolk State hold off Morgan State 85-82 on Monday night. Thomas added five rebounds for the Spartans (19-9, 9-2 Mid-Eastern Athletic Conference). Christian Ings made two 3-pointers and all seven of his free throws, scoring 17. Allen Betrand had 15 points on 6-for-9 shooting with two 3-pointers. Rob Lawson finished with 20 points to lead the Bears (9-18, 5-6). Wynston Tabbs added 19 points and Will Thomas scored 13. ------ The Associated Press created this story using technology provided by Data Skrive and data from Sportradar.
